Question
========
What happens when you click the Run (triangle) button on an R script in Positron?

Answerlist
----------
* The script is sourced in the R console and outputs (like plots) appear in the lower panes
* The file is opened in an external R GUI instead
* Only the first line is executed and the rest ignored
* The script is compiled without running any code

Solution
========
Pressing Run sources the script in Positron, showing console output and plots in the integrated panes.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
